name: Custom Pencil & Ink Sketch of your pet
description:
The best thing about getting a Sketch is that ‘hand made’ feel to it. Seeing all the details and knowing that it’s unique, that it’s the only 1 ever made and it’s all yours.

This image is for illustrative purposes only so don't worry, you'll receive a cute caricature of your pet not this one!

Sketches are hand drawn on A4 sized (21 x 29.7cm) paper and look lovely mounted and framed. Puuurfect for hanging on your wall!

name: Custom Colour Illustration of your pet
description:
A wise man once said ‘everything’s better in colour’ and he was right! If you’re looking for something more vibrant and colourful then this is the one for you.

This image is for illustrative purposes only so don't worry, you'll receive a cute caricature of your pet not this one!

Illustrations are printed on A4 sized (21 x 29.7cm) 192gsm Matt paper and look lovely mounted and framed. Puuurfect for hanging on your wall!

name: Custom Illustration of your pets - 2 pets
description:
If you want 2 pets illustrated that's not a problem.

The way I produce the finished sketch:
Step 1 - I sketch each pet individually
Step 2 - I send you a preview of each sketch and get your approval
Step 3 - I comp the 2 sketches together using my computer and then print the image. Then I painstakingly transfer the image onto lovely 220 gsm cartridge paper and ink it all in. Leaving you with a finished sketch of your 2 pets.

Things to consider when ordering
- The more pets you have in the image the smaller each pet will be. If your pet has very distinctive markings you may want to consider getting them sketched/illustrated individually?

name: Custom sketch of your pets - 3 Pets
description:
If you want 3 pets sketched that's not a problem.

The way I produce the finished sketch:
Step 1 - I sketch each pet individually
Step 2 - I send you a preview of each sketch and get your approval
Step 3 - I comp the 3 sketches together using my computer and then print the image. Then I painstakingly transfer the image onto lovely 220 gsm cartridge paper and ink it all in. Leaving you with a finished sketch of your 3 pets.

Things to consider when ordering
- The more pets you have in the image the smaller each pet will be. If your pet has very distinctive markings you may want to consider getting them sketched/illustrated individually?

name: Harry's Mug
description:
Harry the loveable licking machine now has his own mug!

Although he doesn't think the likeness is that great we agree to disagree!

Be cool, buy a mug!
